snippet.title: This home sold for more than any other home in Cannon Hill has ever sold for before - realestate.com.au
snippet.content:
62 Keats St, Cannon Hill
THE sale of a Keats St home has broken the house price record for Cannon Hill. The home sold shortly after auction and under auction conditions for $1.32 million. It broke the previous suburb record for an individual residential house sale by $120,000.
62 Keats St, Cannon Hill
There were six registered bidders vying for the house at Marketing agent Meagan Muir of place said the suburb was experiencing significant demand at the moment. She said it was considered a "family-friendly'' suburb which was predicted to experience strong capital growth in the near future.
62 Keats St, Cannon Hill
The five-bedroom home was built in 2003 on a 840sq m block. The dual-level home had VJ walls, ornate cornices and timber flooring. There were formal and informal living spaces and a rear deck. There is swimming pool. On the ground level are two separate rumpus areas.
62 Keats St, Cannon Hill
According to CoreLogic figures the median house price at Cannon Hill is $750,000 with 44 homes selling for more than that in the past 12 months.
